titles: The Scotch souldiers speech concerning the Kings coronation-oath.
author: Montrose, James Graham, Marquis of, 1612-1650, attributed name.
notes: Later editions are attributed, probably erroneously, to James Graham, Marquis of Montrose.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
